scripts.start:dev: docker rm mdn_${npm_package_name}_dev_container || true && docker run --rm -it -p 8085:8085 --mount type=bind,src=`pwd`,dst=/usr/src/app --name mdn_${npm_package_name}_dev_container martindevnow/${npm_package_name}_dev:latest npm run serve
scripts.start:prod: docker rm mdn_${npm_package_name}_prod_container || true && docker run -it -p 8080:80 --name mdn_${npm_package_name}_prod_container martindevnow/${npm_package_name}_prod:latest
scripts.start:unit: docker exec -it mdn_${npm_package_name}_dev_container npm run test:unit
scripts.ci:test: npm run build:dev && docker run --rm -it martindevnow/${npm_package_name}_dev:latest npm run test:unit
